evidence.text: No monitoring reports were referenced in any document, as confirmed by regex searches for 'monitor[ing]?' (Step 5) and full text review of all documents (including Order/Opinion, Docket, and Complaints).

No document in the corpus contains any reference to a court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor, as confirmed by comprehensive regex searches for 'monitor', 'monitoring', and related terms (see Step 3 and Step 5).
